articles.author: Ashish Magotra
articles.title: WTC Final, Day 1: Australia have Head in the right place - Hindustan Times
articles.description: India left out Ashwin and on an Oval pitch that got better for batting, the bowling attack wilted against Head (146*), Steve Smith (95*) on Day 1 of WTC final. | Cricket
articles.content: Missing Ashwin. Missing Bumrah. Missing Pant. So much of the first day of the World Test Championship final at The Oval on Wednesday left us yearning for these game changers. None of them are playing… [+5133 chars]

articles.title: IND vs AUS Live Score, WTC 2023 Final Day 1: Travis Head Solid, Steve Smith Nears Century; Australia Cross 300 vs India - NDTV Sports
articles.description: India vs Australia, WTC Final 2023, Day 1 Highlights: Travis Head remained unbeaten on 146 while Steve Smith was not out on 95 as Australia dominated Day 1 of the ongoing WTC final against India
